name: Vegan Chocolate Pumpkin Cake and Cake Mix
description: This Vegan Chocolate Pumpkin Cake Mix is a perfect gift in a jar. Just add pumpkin and non dairy milk and bake. Moist, delicious, spiced. One Bowl Pumpkin chocolate Bread / Cake . (1 Quart Mason Jar), makes 1 medium size loaf 8.5 by 4.5 inch. For larger loafs, double the recipe.)
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup oat flour  (or unbleached white flour)
1/4 cup vegan bittersweet chocolate or dark chocolate or semi sweet chocolate (about 1.25 oz)
1/3 cup mini vegan chocolate chips  (or regular size vegan chocolate chips)
3 Tbsp oil (or use more pumpkin puree)

itemListElement.text: Layer Spelt flour and cocoa powder.
itemListElement.name: Layer Spelt flour and cocoa powder.

itemListElement.text: In a blender combine oat flour, flax seeds, sugar, dark chocolate, baking powder, baking soda and spices. Blend until the chocolate breaks down into a coarse powder and the mixture is evenly combined.
itemListElement.name: In a blender combine oat flour, flax seeds, sugar, dark chocolate, baking powder, baking soda and spices. Blend until the chocolate breaks down into a coarse powder and the mixture is evenly combined.

itemListElement.text: Layer chocolate chips, close. Add instructions.
itemListElement.name: Layer chocolate chips, close. Add instructions.

recipeInstructions.name: Instructions on the jar/ Make the Chocolate Pumpkin Loaf

itemListElement.text: In a large bowl empty the jar contents and mix.
itemListElement.name: In a large bowl empty the jar contents and mix.

itemListElement.text: Add 1 cup pumpkin, 1/2 cup non dairy milk and oil until combined. (use more pumpkin puree to omit oil)
itemListElement.name: Add 1 cup pumpkin, 1/2 cup non dairy milk and oil until combined. (use more pumpkin puree to omit oil)

itemListElement.text: The batter will be thick. Drop the batter onto parchment lined loaf pan. Even it out. Bake at pre-heated 350 degrees F / 180ºc for 55 minutes or until a toothpick from the center comes out clean.
itemListElement.name: The batter will be thick. Drop the batter onto parchment lined loaf pan. Even it out. Bake at pre-heated 350 degrees F / 180ºc for 55 minutes or until a toothpick from the center comes out clean.

itemListElement.text: Blend the dry ingredients in a blender except mini chocolate chips. Pulse a few times so most of the dark chocolate breaks down and the mixture is homogeneous. Transfer to a bowl. Mix in the mini chocolate chips.
itemListElement.name: Blend the dry ingredients in a blender except mini chocolate chips. Pulse a few times so most of the dark chocolate breaks down and the mixture is homogeneous. Transfer to a bowl. Mix in the mini chocolate chips.

itemListElement.text: Add 1 cup pumpkin, 1/2 cup non dairy milk and oil until combined. (use more pumpkin puree to omit oil)
itemListElement.name: Add 1 cup pumpkin, 1/2 cup non dairy milk and oil until combined. (use more pumpkin puree to omit oil)

itemListElement.text: The batter will be thick. Drop the batter onto parchment lined loaf pan. Even it out. Bake at pre-heated 350 degress F / 180ºc for 55 minutes or until a toothpick from the center comes out clean.
itemListElement.name: The batter will be thick. Drop the batter onto parchment lined loaf pan. Even it out. Bake at pre-heated 350 degress F / 180ºc for 55 minutes or until a toothpick from the center comes out clean.
